title: Ondra Renda Aasaigal Lyrics Kaakha Kaakha
stanzas:
pengalai nirmidhidaa
un iniya ganniyam pudikkudhe.
kangalai neraai paarthuthaan
nee pesum thoranai pudikkudhe.

thoorathil nee vandhaale
en manasil mazhi adikkum.
miga piditha paadal ondrai
udhadugalum munu munukkum.

mandhagaasam sindhum
undhan mugam
maranam varaiyil
en nenjil thangum.

sandhiya kaala megangal
un vaanil oorvalam pogudhe.
paarkayil yeno nenjile
un nadaiyin saarale thondruthe.

nadhigalile neeraadum
sooriyanai naan kanden.
vervaigalin thuli valiya
nee varuvaai ena nindren.

unnal en nenjil aanai manam
naan un sondham endra
ennam tharum.

anbe iravai ketkalaam
iravai ketkalaam
vidiyal thaandiyum
irave neelumaa
irave neelumaa
